message:
"By the Hands of Hope"

Fear, in tense walls, breathes D-I-E.
Khan Younis knows only the S-T-A-R-E
Of countless battles' bitter S-C-A-R-S,
Yet resilience springs with just as many S-T-A-R-S.
Israel and Gaza, an unsought P-A-I-R,
Can peace evolve from their shared D-E-S-P-A-I-R?
prompt: ‘I keep asking myself how will I die?’ Gaza residents in fear as battle for Khan Younis escalates For Almaza Owda, in Gaza’s besieged second city of Khan Younis, thoughts have turned to how she might die. On Thursday night, four days into the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) assault on the southern city, Owda – who is living in a tent in the grounds of a UN school turned shelter – described her feelings. “I
